title: Improving Reflective Teaching Methods Using Learning Analytics: Project-Based Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level theoretical and practical experience in science, with basic proficiency in digital devices
context.additional_context: Science-related job-linked project learning environment for office/administrative workers, with flexible learning configurations through BYOD (Bring Your Own Device), emphasizing pedagogical improvement through reflective practice and real-time data-driven instructional design

learning_goals: Quantitatively analyzing learner behavior patterns using learning analytics tools and proposing at least two weekly project design revisions based on findings
Deriving at least three instructional improvement points through reflective journaling incorporating digital traces such as learner engagement, task performance data, and discussion frequency
Designing a real-time feedback system based on learning analytics results to achieve a 15% improvement in learning achievement by course completion

resources: PBL case database in science disciplines

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
